DataElement.preferredName: Hypertension Greater Than or Equal To Moderate Adverse Event Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether hypertension greater than or equal to a moderate adverse event was present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hypertension Greater Than or Equal To Moderate Adverse Event Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._An experience that is alleviated with simple therapeutic treatments. The event impacts usual daily activities. Includes laboratory test alterations indicating injury, but without long-term risk.

Concepts.definition: Blood pressure that is abnormally high.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Moderate Adverse Event Present
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:An experience that is alleviated with simple therapeutic treatments. The event impacts usual daily activities. Includes laboratory test alterations indicating injury, but without long-term risk.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
An experience that is alleviated with simple therapeutic treatments. The event impacts usual daily activities. Includes laboratory test alterations indicating injury, but without long-term risk.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.
